General.Name: Hindustan Oil Exploration Company Limited
General.Description: Hindustan Oil Exploration Company Limited engages in the exploration, development, and production of onshore and offshore crude oil and natural gas in India. It also provides oil field equipment and services. Hindustan Oil Exploration Company Limited was incorporated in 1983 and is based in Chennai, India.
